TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Quaternion extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Numerics.Quaternion>
Public Structure Quaternion Implements IEquatable(Of Quaternion)

summary.span: Representa un vector que se usa para codificar rotaciones físicas tridimensionales.

span.span: Represents a vector that is used to encode three-dimensional physical rotations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El estructura se usa para girar eficazmente un vector de objeto sobre la (x, y, z) por el theta ángulo, donde:The structure is used to efficiently rotate an object about the (x,y,z) vector by the angle theta, where: ``` w = cos(theta/2) ```

span.span: Creates a new object.

span.span: The quaternion containing the values that result from subtracting each element in from its corresponding element in .

summary.span: Devuelve una cadena que representa este cuaternión.

span.span: Returns a string that represents this quaternion.

returns.span: Representación de cadena de este cuaternión.

span.span: The string representation of this quaternion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los valores numéricos en la cadena devuelta se formatean mediante las convenciones de la referencia cultural actual.The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture. Por ejemplo, la referencia cultural en-US, la cadena devuelta puede aparecer como `{X:1.1 Y:2.2 Z:3.3 W:4.4}`.For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{X:1.1 Y:2.2 Z:3.3 W:4.4}`.
